items.content_html: Posted by Kevin Miao and Matt McEwen, Research Scientists, Quantum AI Team     The qubits that make up Google quantum devices are delicate and noisy, so itâ€™s necessary to incorporate error correction procedures that identify and account for qubit errors on the way to building a useful quantum computer.
